name: Bone Club
description: You strike a creature with a club of bone, doing 1d10 + MOVE ground damage on a successful hit. If the natural attack roll is 18 or more, the target flinches.
higherLevels: The damage dice roll for this move changes to 2d8 at level 5, 5d4 at level 10, and 4d8 at level 17.

contest.effect: An appealing move that can be used repeatedly without boring the audience.
